title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
**COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping (2-Pack)**

Upgrade your sleep experience with the luxurious COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows, meticulously designed to cater to a variety of sleeping positions, including back, stomach, and side sleepers. This set of two pillows is the perfect addition to any bed for those seeking a restful night's sleep with cooling comfort.

**Key Features:**

- **Size & Quantity:** Each pack contains two queen-sized pillows, perfect for your queen bed or to enhance the comfort of any sleeping area.
- **Material:** The pillows are filled with plush hollow fiber, a down alternative microfiber that offers the softness and comfort of down without the allergens. The cover is made from a soft and durable polyester blend, ensuring a skin-friendly experience.
- **Cooling Design:** Designed with breathability in mind, the cooling feature ensures that you stay comfortable and cool throughout the night.
- **Supportive & Retains Shape:** Engineered with a no-shift construction, these pillows provide excellent neck support and retain their shape for continuous comfort.
- **Skin-Friendly:** The materials used are gentle on the skin, making these pillows suitable for everyone.
- **Machine Washable:** Easy to care for, the pillows are machine washable at 30°C and can be tumble-dried on a low setting, making maintenance a breeze.
- **Vacuum Packed:** For your convenience and to ensure freshness, the pillows are vacuum packed. It is recommended to allow a 24-hour waiting period before use to let the pillows fluff up to their full potential.

Whether you're a back sleeper, stomach sleeper, or side sleeper, the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows are designed to adapt to your individual needs, providing you with the ultimate sleeping experience. Say goodbye to restless nights and hello to mornings feeling refreshed and revitalized.

**Care Instructions:**
For best results and longevity, machine wash at 30°C and tumble dry on a low setting. Please follow the care instructions carefully to keep your pillows in pristine condition.

Transform your sleep today with COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows and wake up to a better tomorrow!

**COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping (2-Pack)**

Transform your sleep experience with the luxurious comfort of the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows, designed to cater to all types of sleepers—back, stomach, and side. This set of two pillows is the perfect addition to your bedding collection, promising restful nights and refreshed mornings.

**Product Features:**

- **Size:** Queen
- **Quantity:** Set of 2 pillows
- **Material:** Premium down alternative microfiber offers a plush, comfortable feel, while the soft polyester blend cover ensures a gentle touch against your skin.
- **Filling:** Plush hollow fiber filling provides the perfect balance of support and softness, adapting to your unique sleeping position.
- **Cooling Technology:** Designed with breathability in mind, these pillows feature cooling properties to help regulate temperature and enhance your sleep quality.
- **Skin-Friendly:** Crafted with materials that are gentle on your skin, ensuring a comfortable and irritant-free sleep.
- **Supportive:** Whether you're a back, stomach, or side sleeper, the pillow's no-shift construction maintains its shape and support throughout the night.
- **Care Instructions:** Effortless maintenance with machine washability at a warm 30°C and tumble dry compatibility on a low setting.
- **Packaging:** Arrives vacuum-packed for convenience and hygiene. Please allow a recommended wait time of 24 hours before use to allow the pillow to fully expand to its original fluffy shape.

**Benefits:**

- **Versatile Support:** Adapts to all sleep positions for a customized sleep experience.
- **Breathable Comfort:** Stay cool and comfortable all night long with the pillow's breathable design.
- **Easy Care:** Machine washable and tumble dryable for a hassle-free clean.
- **Durable:** With a no-shift construction, the pillow retains its shape and support, providing long-lasting comfort.

Upgrade to the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows today and experience the ultimate in comfort and support. These pillows are not only designed to enhance your sleep but also to complement your lifestyle with ease of care. Enjoy a cooler, more comfortable rest tonight and every night.
